title: A Brotherly Christmas
description: It’s Christmas Eve and Josh turns eighteen at midnight.For years, he’s pined over the forbidden love he harbors for his brother, Jake, but he knows he’ll never get to act on that taboo desire. But Josh is the kind of guy that never gives up on hope…just like he never gives up on believing in Santa.For Josh, Santa is real, he sees him every Christmas Eve. Normally, Josh is a good boy and always ends up on the good list—but this year, his eighteenth, he wants to play a little prank on Santa, even if it risks putting him on the naughty list.But when the prank is caught and Santa confronts him, his potential punishment turns into a gift he’ll never forget.
author: Rhett Blue
